style: professional dark-mode growth chart, OG social card format
scene: A dark analytics dashboard showing a dramatic hockey-stick growth curve glowing in bright blue (#5B8AEF). The chart shows a relatively flat line that suddenly curves sharply upward. The text +600% is displayed in large bold white near the peak. Subtle education icons (graduation cap, book, pencil) in the background. Two small domain cards labeled 'app' and 'marketing' sit below the chart. Dark charcoal background (#0a0a0a). Clean, modern, startup energy.
